englishResources.name: Duolingo
englishResources.description: Gamified language learning app with bite-sized lessons and exercises.

englishResources.name: BBC Learning English
englishResources.description: Free lessons, videos, and quizzes for English learners, including news-based materials.

englishResources.name: EnglishCentral
englishResources.description: Learn English through popular videos with interactive transcripts and vocabulary tools.

englishResources.name: Grammarly
englishResources.description: AI-powered writing assistant that helps improve grammar, spelling, and style.

englishResources.name: Coursera - English Language Courses
englishResources.description: Various English language courses from top universities and institutions.

englishResources.name: FluentU
englishResources.description: Learn English through real-world videos like music videos, movie trailers, and news.

englishResources.name: Memrise
englishResources.description: Vocabulary-focused app using spaced repetition and mnemonics for efficient learning.

englishResources.name: italki
englishResources.description: Connect with native English speakers for one-on-one tutoring or language exchange.

englishResources.name: TED Talks
englishResources.description: Engaging talks on various topics, great for listening practice and expanding vocabulary.

englishResources.name: Linguee
englishResources.description: Dictionary that provides translations in context from real-world sources.
